name: Gal-X-E
description: Gal-X-E aims to revive the old-school shoot em up genre, and adds modern elements to it! Fight your way through endless waves of randomly generated madness! Collect spaceships and show the enemy who's boss!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and Higher Processor: Single Core 2.5 GHZ or Higher Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: Standard Sound Card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP or Higher Processor: Dual Core 2.9 GHZ or Higher Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB Video Ram DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Standard Sound Card

reviews.review_text: I bought this game thinking I played it when I did not have anything else to do, but i really love it!

Although I am not usually a big fan of space shoot em ups, this game managed to hook me for some odd reason. It is really challenging and will appeal to the sweaty old school arcade nerds who like to chase highscores.  Pros: Challenging Awesome music Addicting gameplay  Cons: Need a new keyboard
Fun time-passing game but the getting of new ships is too slow. To gain enough experience points takes too long but overall is a fun game. Can't change resolution either
